entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 01:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
